headline: Invesco Convertible Securities Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Convertibles (as measured by the ICE BofA US Convertible Index) lost 2.14% for the first quarter, compared to the S&P 500 Index, which lost 4.27%. Read more here.

headline: Hold Your Saddle At Wells Fargo, As This Year's Bumpy Road Could Improve
summary: I'm reaffirming my prior hold rating on Wells Fargo, after use of an updated research/analysis methodology to consider additional factors.

headline: Invesco Comstock Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: The largest contributors to relative return were consumer staples, health care and consumer discretionary, primarily due to stock selection. Read more here.

headline: Invesco Growth And Income Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: Reversing a trend in Q4, value stocks outperformed growth in Q1 as the Russell 1000 Value Index returned 2.14% and the Russell 1000 Growth Index returned -9.97%.
